name: Overboard (itch) (Avix Games)
description:
Complete your first shipment across the river and keep your job.

///// HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD  to move magnet horizontally
  • SHIFT to descend magnet
  • SPACE to ascend magnet
  • Q/E to rotate magnet
  • MOUSE CLICK to hold shipment

Prototype made in 3 days by Nehuen Defosse & Ismael Loreto at Avix Games
